name: Spirits (itch) (esztxr)
description:
While I was searching for crystals, I stumbled upon a Spirit deep in the cave, seemingly stranded and struggling for release. I knew I had to help it find its way out. My heart quivered as I approached, bracing myself for whatever surprises were bound to be encountered. Yet, when our eyes met, an instant bond was forged between us; one that could not be easily severed nor forgotten.

I instantly knew that I needed to help it!

Meet Bones - a tiny, glowing, crystal-loving creature! They love nothing more than collecting rare and valuable crystals from all around the world. 

When it comes to moving around their environment, they rely on pressing A and D. Pressing A moves them left while pressing D will move them right - it's an easy way for them to get around quickly and collect those precious gems!

Press the space button and jump as high as you can! Remember that when you hold down the button, you control how high you jump. Good luck!
